select.columns: 2 , crp_valstock_get_varlord( gcomalbl.linori, gcommovd.tabori, gcomalbh.tipdoc, gcomalbh.fecmov, gcommovd.valord, gcomalbh.auxnum2) valord, 2 , TO_CHAR(gcomalbh.fecmov, '%Y%m00') , garticul.codigo , garticul.nomart , garticul.auxchr1 , SUBSTR(garticul.webfam, 1, 5) , garticul.webfam , equivalente_crpi_stkm.codigo_crpi , glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta , CASE WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_codalm = gcomalbh.almori AND glog_stkmov.stkm_codalm = gcomalbh.almdes THEN NULL WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'DISP' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'SINT' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NULL THEN equivalente_crpi_stkm.codigo_crpi WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'TRAN' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'SINT' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NULL THEN equivalente_crpi_stkm.codigo_crpi WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'TRAN' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'TATD' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NOT NULL THEN equivalente_crpi_des.codigo_crpi WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'DISP' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'TATD' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NOT NULL THEN equivalente_crpi_ori.codigo_crpi WHEN gcomalbh.tipdoc IN ('DRDI', 'TRAL', 'RTRA', 'ECFA') AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN equivalente_crpi_ori.codigo_crpi WHEN gcomalbh.tipdoc IN ('DRDI', 'TRAL', 'RTRA', 'ECFA') AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN equivalente_crpi_des.codigo_crpi ELSE NULL END , CASE WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_codalm = gcomalbh.almori AND glog_stkmov.stkm_codalm = gcomalbh.almdes THEN NULL WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'DISP' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'SINT' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NULL THEN 'TRAN' WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'TRAN' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'SINT' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NULL THEN 'DISP' WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'TRAN' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'TATD' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NOT NULL THEN 'DISP' WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'DISP' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'TATD' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NOT NULL THEN 'TRAN' WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'DISP' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'ECFA' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NULL THEN 'CDFA' WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'CDFA' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'ECFA' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NULL THEN 'DISP' WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'DISP' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'ECFA' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NOT NULL THEN 'CDFA' WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_cuenta = 'CDFA' AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'ECFA' AND gcomalbh.almdes IS NOT NULL THEN 'DISP' WHEN gcomalbh.almdes = 'CRP0295F' AND glog_stkmov.stkm_codalm != gcomalbh.almdes AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'DRDI' THEN 'DEVP' WHEN gcomalbh.almdes = 'CRP0295F' AND glog_stkmov.stkm_codalm = gcomalbh.almdes AND gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'DRDI' THEN 'DISP' WHEN gcomalbh.tipdoc IN ('TRAL', 'DRDI', 'RTRA') AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN 'DISP' WHEN gcomalbh.tipdoc IN ('TRAL', 'DRDI', 'RTRA') AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN 'DISP' WHEN gcomalbh.almdes = 'CRP0295F' AND glog_stkmov.stkm_codalm != gcomalbh.almdes THEN 'DEVP' WHEN gcomalbh.almdes = 'CRP0295F' AND glog_stkmov.stkm_codalm = gcomalbh.almdes THEN 'DISP' ELSE NULL END , UPPER(gcommovd.nomdoc) , NVL(gcomalbh.cabid, gcomalbh.cabid) , NVL(gcomalbh.tipdoc, gcomalbh.tipdoc) , NVL(gcomalbh.docser, gcomalbh.docser) , NULL , NULL nro_guia_chavin, TO_CHAR(gcomalbh.fecmov, '%d-%m-%Y') , TO_CHAR(gcomalbh.date_created, '%H:%M:%S') , ctercero.cif , ctercero.nombre , CASE WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NOT NULL THEN '01' WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NULL AND gcomalbl.linid IS NOT NULL THEN '09' ELSE '00' END , SUBSTR(gcomfach.refter, 0,CHARINDEX('-', gcomfach.refter)-1) , SUBSTR(gcomfach.refter, CHARINDEX('-', gcomfach.refter)+1, 8) , CAST(gcomfach.fecha AS DATETIME YEAR TO SECOND) , gart_unimed.nomuni , crp_unimed.codsun, 'NIU' , CASE WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN 'INGRESO' ELSE 'EGRESO' END operacion, CASE WHEN gcomalbl.dtoli1 = 100 THEN '07' ELSE NVL(fach_tipdoc.tsunat, albh_tipdoc.tsunat) END , CASE WHEN gcomalbl.dtoli1 = 100 THEN 'BONIFICACIÃ“N' ELSE NVL(fach_tipdoc.descri, albh_tipdoc.descri) END , NULL tipo_transferencia, CASE WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov ELSE 0 END , CASE WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NULL AND gcomalbl.linid IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) WHEN gcomalbl.linid IS NULL AND NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) ELSE 0 END , CASE WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN (NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0)*glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov) WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NULL AND gcomalbl.linid IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN (NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0)*glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov) WHEN gcomalbl.linid IS NULL AND NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov > 0 THEN (NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0)*glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov) ELSE 0 END , CASE WHEN glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN (glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov*-1) ELSE 0 END , CASE WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NULL AND gcomalbl.linid IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) WHEN gcomalbl.linid IS NULL AND NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) ELSE 0 END , CASE WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN (NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0)*glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov)*-1 WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NULL AND gcomalbl.linid IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN (NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0)*glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov)*-1 WHEN gcomalbl.linid IS NULL AND NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) IS NOT NULL AND glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov < 0 THEN (NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0)*glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov)*-1 ELSE 0 END , CASE WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) WHEN gcomfacl.linid IS NULL AND gcomalbl.linid IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) WHEN gcomalbl.linid IS NULL AND NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) ELSE 0 END , 0 can_ini, 0 cos_ini, 0 tot_ini, 0 can_fin, 0 cos_fin, 0 tot_fin, (NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0)*glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov) , glog_stkmov.stkm_canmov , NVL(gcomalbl.impcos,0) , CASE WHEN garticul.taxkey = 'BOG' THEN 'AFECTO' ELSE 'INAFECTO' END , NULL precio, NULL porcentajedr, NULL precioajustado, NULL subtotal, NULL igv, NULL total, CASE WHEN gcomalbh.tipdoc IN ('TATD', 'TATL') THEN SUBSTR(gcomalbh.docori,1,4) WHEN gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'DRDI' AND gcomalbh.docori LIKE 'AFAR%' THEN SUBSTR(gcomalbh.docori,1,4) END , CASE WHEN gcomalbh.tipdoc IN ('TATD', 'TATL') THEN gcomalbh.docori WHEN gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'DRDI' AND gcomalbh.docori LIKE 'AFAR%' THEN gcomalbh.docori END , gcomalbh.fecmov , NULL dni_paciente, NULL nombre_paciente, NULL nro_doc_copago, NULL fec_doc_copago, crp_tipo_producto.descri tipo_producto, NULL pto_cosumo, NULL zona, NULL desc_zona, NULL porc_descto, NULL prod_chavin, NULL cod_procedimiento, CASE WHEN select.where:
gcomalbh.tipdoc = 'ACOB' AND
garticul_ext.is_kardex = 'S' AND galmacen_ori.auxfec1 NOT IN('M', 'I') AND gcomfach.tipdoc NOT IN ('RFAC', 'SFAR') AND gcomalbh.fecmov BETWEEN '16-11-2023' AND '16-11-2023'
